document_data.name: Cloven Shield
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cloven Shield''' was an inn and tavern in [[Marsember]], [[Cormyr]], in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Geography: The tavern was situated on the island in the central southeast of Marsember and close to the sea.
document_data.Structure: Its sign was a shield broken in two.
document_data.Atmosphere:
Patrons found a place designed for drinking and partying into the late hours. It was used by [[adventurers]] and [[Mercenary|mercenaries]] as well as those looking to hire them, often unsavory customers representing the [[Zhentarim]], the [[Cult of the Dragon]], and factions in [[Thay]]. Thus, fights and brawls broke out regularly, often late at night.

Even though the place was noisy, the establishment offered fair quality food at a cheap price. And while one would not likely sleep the night through, renting a room and trying to was cheap enough to be worth it to some.
document_data.Prices: The large rooms at the rear could house large groups and could be rented for 10 [[gp]] per night, including stabling and ordinary evening meals for nine people.
